```{r load_data}
library(gapminder)
gap <- gapminder
plot(lifeExp ~ year, data=gap)

```
```{r}
library(readxl)

gapminder <- read_excel("data/gapminder_data.xlsx")
summary(gapminder)
```

```{r}
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(data = gapminder, mapping = aes(x = year , y = lifeExp)) + geom_point() 
```
